title: Ray Bryant - 1970 - MCMLXX (2012) FLAC
description:
Ray Bryant - 1970 - MCMLXX (2012)

Despite some commercial tendencies, this 1970 LP (not yet reissued on CD) is better than it looks. Pianist Ray Bryant uplifts such pop material as "Let It Be," "Bridge Over Troubled Waters," "Hey Jude," and "Spinning Wheel." Four selections find Bryant's trio (with electric bassist Chuck Rainey and drummer Jimmy Johnson) augmented by either horns (on "Let It Be") or by strings effectively arranged by Eumir Deodata. The colorful results are not essential but are less dated than one might think. (Allmusic)
It looks like the review on AllMusic is before 2012

Track list:
01 - Stick with It
02 - Let It Be
03 - Bridge over Troubled Water
04 - Hey Jude
05 - Shake-A-Lady
06 - Unchained Melody
07 - My Cherie Amour
08 - Spinning Wheel

Enjoy and share!
